description:
Scorpio Miro finally faces off against one of the God Warriors, Surt. However, standing in his way is none other than Gold Saint Aquarius Camus! Meanwhile in town, Aiolia and Lyfia run into Cancer Deathmask on their quest for Yggdrasil.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gekitotsu! Gold Saint vs Gold Saint
Gold vs. Gold: Clash of the Saints!
Scontro micidiale! Cavaliere d`Oro contro Cavaliere d`Oro!
激突! 黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]VS黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]
